MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G12 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12.15pm to repair electrical equipment at the pillar on Highburgh Road and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.43am on Tuesday 26th January 2021.
